title: A Quality Conversation with John Vervaeke
description: We talk about the consonance between John's relevance realization and​ Pirisig's MOQ, updating rationality for the Meaning Crisis, the threat and promise of AI, getting lost in the virtual world, Phaedrus' beef with Plato and Aristotle, and many more topics...with Quality!
